productIdentifier.additionalIdentification: EU Index No.: 607-061-00-8; IUPAC: prop-2-enoic acid; Synonyms: glacial acrylic acid, propenoic acid, acroleic acid, ethylenecarboxylic acid.

identified: Used for synthetic rubber latex manufacture.
Monomer for superabsorbent polymers, coatings, adhesives (industrial).
advisedAgainst: Use in consumer products without appropriate industrial controls.
Use without effective polymerization inhibitor present and oxygen control.

exposureControls.engineeringControls: Use local exhaust/containment to keep concentrations below OELs. Provide emergency eyewash and safety shower.

personalProtectiveEquipment.eyeOrFace: Chemical splash goggles and face shield.

hand.description: Select gloves based on breakthrough times provided by the manufacturer.

personalProtectiveEquipment.respiratory: If exposure exceeds OELs, use approved respirator suitable for organic vapours and acid gases; use SCBA for emergency response.

exposureControls.environmentalControls: Avoid discharge to the environment. Collect spillage and treat effluent before disposal.
